version_description: Optimize and fix some known problems

-. Add default parameters option to restore device.
-. Prompt message when setting device parameters.
-. Fix some known problems.

-added support for more new equipment.
-add "timeline playback" function.
-fix known problems.
-fixed a failure to verify the first addition of equipment to the distribution network in some environments.
Fix some problems

-New support for low-power devices.
-fix known problems such as timeline playback.
- Support for humanoid recognition alarm equipment

- optimize multiple usage details for low-power devices.
- Adaptive iPhone XR/Max.

-Open the active connection to the low-power device in hibernation for the first time.
-Optimize and fix known problems.

-improve the connection mode of low-power devices.
-optimize part of the iPhone display effect.

- Fix some device mail display errors.
- fixed some areas of the user timeline playback calendar does not correspond to the problem.
- detail adjustment.

-adjust the multi-regional localization language pack.
-some devices support modification of resolution
- Support for humanoid recognition alarm equipment

-support for more device humanoid alarms.
-some devices support light control.
-fix known issu

-add cloud playback feature.
-added 4G-battery camera support.
-fixed some known problems on iOS13 systems.

-new cloud storage usage information page for cloud storage devices.
-fix some problems.

-Fix some problems

-optimize cloud playback download and playback.
-fixed battery camera operator display problem.
Cameras in some areas can purchase cloud storage functions for devices separately.
-wait for the timeout when adding a camera.
